Follow-up extraction scoped to MECH-056 replay-prioritization and planning coupling. Proposal completion extraction for LIT-0014 scoped to MECH-056.

BYOL directly uses a slow EMA target with a fast online predictor and shows stable learning without collapse, closely matching target-anchor/predictor timescale separation. Follow-up extraction scoped to MECH-058 anchor/predictor timescale separation. Proposal completion extraction for LIT-0017 scoped to MECH-058.

Explicit decomposition of aleatoric and epistemic uncertainty supports separating precision/uncertainty streams from residual prediction error, but is not JEPA-specific. Follow-up extraction scoped to MECH-059 confidence-channel decomposition. Proposal completion extraction for LIT-0019 scoped to MECH-059.

Empirical conflict-monitoring evidence links ACC signals to downstream control adjustment, strongly supporting control routing claims; mapping to specific habenula-style aversive gating and dual-error channel implementation is still partial. Follow-up extraction scoped to MECH-060 control arbitration and conflict-monitoring interface. Proposal completion extraction for LIT-0021 scoped to MECH-060.

Replay expression tracks reward-change structure rather than a fixed exploration floor, weakening the necessity of a minimum entropy floor as a universal hippocampal constraint. Follow-up extraction scoped to Q-011 replay-priority modulation under reward shifts. Proposal completion extraction for LIT-0026 scoped to Q-011.

Provides direct theoretical separation of distinct uncertainty/control functions across neuromodulatory systems, supporting REE orthogonal control-axis decomposition. Follow-up extraction scoped to Q-017 uncertainty-sensitive control allocation. Proposal completion extraction for LIT-0032 scoped to Q-017.
